projects.title: CleanMark
projects.description: Extract noise-free, structured content from any URL. Perfect for AI training, documentation, and content analysis.

projects.title: NPM Stats
projects.description: A free analytics platform for npm packages providing detailed insights into download metrics, bundle size analysis, dependency visualization, and security scanning.

projects.title: Domain Explorer
projects.description: A comprehensive domain research tool offering advanced search, WHOIS lookup, DNS record analysis, and domain availability checking for informed domain management.

projects.title: Ingenious Stream
projects.description: An entertainment streaming platform providing access to live TV channels, radio broadcasts from around the world, and a movie library in multiple languages.

projects.title: Post Office
projects.description: A comprehensive post office lookup and search tool providing detailed information about post offices, including location data and geographic details.

projects.title: React Learning Hub
projects.description: An interactive learning platform designed to help developers master React through hands-on examples, tutorials, and real-world projects.

projects.title: Medusa Plugins
projects.description: A comprehensive collection of powerful plugins for Medusa e-commerce platform, extending functionality and enhancing your online store capabilities.

projects.title: Markdown Live Preview
projects.description: A live markdown preview tool that allows you to write markdown and see the rendered output in real-time, perfect for documentation and content creation.

projects.title: HTML Code Editor
projects.description: A feature-rich HTML code editor with live preview, syntax highlighting, and code formatting capabilities for building and testing HTML projects.
